ygData.subject: Gemcutter
ygData.msgSnippet: Any word on the gemcutter? Has anyone yet to try the grease, gemcutter, bar and gem? Where can these patterns that don t work for anyone be aquired hell I will
ygData.messageBody:
Any word on the gemcutter? Has anyone yet to try the grease,
gemcutter, bar and gem? Where can these patterns that don't work for
anyone be aquired hell I will try it if no one else will I hope that
the Cutter is worth while unlike the majority of tinkered stuff. If
it is in anyway akin to fireworks I will be upset:) As for the
expansion I have heard there will be three underwater dungons I hope
against hope that this is fact and not fiction.

Grundup Tinkertot Punddlejumper
